articles.author: BBC News
articles.description: A shipping company shelving a major investment and Russian hackers attacking UK ambulance services feature in the papers.

articles.description: Movements at the McCullough family home were secretive, but neighbours could never have known why.

articles.description: Three venomous scorpions have been found in parcels in the UK in the last month, expert Chris Newman says.

articles.title: US urges Israel to stop shooting at UN peacekeepers in Lebanon

articles.description: The company said all jobs are at risk as it cuts 10% of its workforce
